title: Volume 17, Number 6
summary: The newsletter covers EMS liability, public duty doctrine, safety bills, HIPAA violations, property tax issues, emergency preparedness, budgeting, training compliance, and litigation.
compressed_content: The newsletter covers EMS liability, public duty doctrine, safety bills, HIPAA violations, property tax issues, emergency preparedness, budgeting, training compliance, and litigation. EMS liability cases highlight the importance of negligence in personal liability. Public duty doctrine emphasizes the city's responsibility for EMS providers. Safety bills impact firefighter regulations and workplace safety. HIPAA violations are explored in employment law contexts. Property tax issues relate to public duty obligations for fire departments. Emergency preparedness is a key focus area for agencies. Budgeting and compliance with legal standards are emphasized. Training compliance ensures adherence to regulatory requirements. Litigation provides guidance on liability claims.
